title: Buena Tierra
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Caribbean
description: Breakfast, lunch, coffee, tea, organic wine, and cake. Daily specials at approx. 4000 colones include soup, salad, rice, beans and an entree (no drink). Pita breads with different fillings. Also sells take-home organic food, cosmetics, cleaning products and more. Organic market on Wednesday (but check website occasional closures). Directions: Located 1 block south (up the hill) from San Miguel Catholic Church's main entrance in a green 2-story building decorated w/mosaics in the Buena Tierra Mall.
